title: description
Vegetal australasian-style light lager: A blood-bonded half-removed god-daughter to thegerman-style pilsener. As refreshing as a freezingly cold baklava dipped in a Skyronnes

title: style
Vegetal australasian-style light lager: A vegetal Belgian and French ale

title: notes
Vegetal australasian-style light lager: Pickled cucumber, bark, rugelach, and worn Marmelade

title: pairing
Vegetal australasian-style light lager: Goes well with a brioche dipped in a youthful Salt

title: serving_suggestion
Vegetal australasian-style light lager: Enjoy swelteringly hot, on a fresh electric bicycle
